author: adrianc
msg: Reverting rev 1646969 because it breaks tree rendering.
I need this fixed so I can begin working on tree widget refactoring. During refactoring I will most likely solve the problem rev 1646969 was trying to fix.

author: kpvdr
msg: QPID-5671 [linearstore] Add ability to use disk partitions and select per-queue EFPs: WIP, but mostly complete. Needs additional testing. It is now possible to add queues which use a partition other than the broker default by using qpid-config --durable together with --efp--partition-num and/or --efp-pool-file-size

author: marcus
msg: Fixed the lost updates for the header section, fixed the layout in the section for blog posts/news
